sentences.english: Her sister praised cheung Po tsai for father try dew filial, make cheung Po tsai in a good mood.
sentences.chinese: 娣妹大讚張保仔爲父試甘露盡孝，令張保仔心情大好。

sentences.english: Now how about the Seduction Science guy who has conscious control over the sexual state he projects?
sentences.chinese: 現在來說說把妹達人是如何控制他的性張力的。

sentences.english: Therefore, my classmates called me "noodle girl" at that time.
sentences.chinese: 因此同學們都改叫我“米粉妹”。

sentences.english: Speak, stone jiao found cheung Po ts ai coming on to her sister.
sentences.chinese: 言談間，石嬌發現張保仔對娣妹有意思。

sentences.english: In meeting the bride, her sister is acknowledged cheung Po tsais lover.
sentences.chinese: 就在拜堂之際，娣妹承認是張保仔的情人。

sentences.english: Her sister to avoid sister embarrassed, gave eight thousand yuan to her daughters.
sentences.chinese: 娣妹爲免姊姊爲難，將八千元交給娣女。

sentences.english: I would like to make a donation for the communication scholarship.
sentences.chinese: 本人願意捐款支持傳理獎學金，讓學弟妹受惠。

sentences.english: Cheung Po ts ai through her sister room, only to see its shadow have sweet in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 張保仔路經娣妹房間，只是見到其身影已經甜在心頭。
